public class Player extends Character implements com.github.hanyaeger.api.userinput.KeyListener, com.github.hanyaeger.api.userinput.MouseMovedListener
A playable character listens to mouse movements and pressed keys

    • Player

      public Player(com.github.hanyaeger.api.Coordinate2D startLocation, int health, int playerLevel, GameScreen screen)
      Creates a playable character to add to a scene
      Parameters:
      startLocation - the start location of the player
      health - the amount of max health and current health
      playerLevel - the level of the player
      screen - the screen where the player is located

      Parameters:
